channel.title: How do i edit item stat bonuses on Pimpscape?
channel.description:
Can [glow=yellow,2,300]AnYoNe[/glow] Help me:
How do i edit the stat bonuses items i equip :rolleyes:
Example: [glow=black,2,300]Full Ghostly[/glow] (+0 to everything) i want to change those stats to something else... such as +50 to everything Or SoM3tHiNg... :|
[glow=navy,2,300]So can someone help me out 3r3 PlZ?[/glow] ;)

item.title: How do i edit item stat bonuses on Pimpscape?
item.dc:creator: @Loosyloo Loosyloo
item.description:
@Loosyloo wrote:

well

go into item.cfg and ctrl+f and search for the item you are wanting to change
EXAMPLE
Perfect ring,

‘perfect’ ring as i would search keep looking WAMMO I FOUND IT now the 10000’s are the stat bonuses take them all down to 0 and save compile and if you did corectly weild a perfect ring it should be 0

BASED ON PIMPSCAE PERFECT RING TRY YOUR ITEM THE SAME WAY

Read full topic
